title: Microsoft rolls out new Windows 11 features today
description:
Hot on the heels of the Windows 11 2022 Update (22H2), Microsoft is now providing its first new group of additional features to the operating system. This includes a tabbed File Explorer, an overflow area of the Taskbar, Suggested Actions, and more — and you can download them today.

title: Firefox’s latest update adds a nifty PDF editing feature
description:
Dealing with an Adobe Acrobat PDF file that you have to edit, sign and return can still be a pain, even on modern browsers. Mozilla’s Firefox 106 release, however, says it solved the problem, with editable PDF files that you can sign as well.

title: Best Lenovo laptops: Best overall, best battery life, and more
description:
Whether you’re looking for powerful internals or an awesome keyboard, Lenovo laptops are both reliable and highly rated. Here at PCWorld, we’ve personally used and tested a number of Lenovo laptops, from ThinkPads to Yogas and everything in between.

title: Samsung’s Quick Search app blows away Windows 11’s built-in search
description:
We’ve come to expect that searching your PC for files will be like searching the web: almost instantaneous and almost perfect. But it’s always that one file—I know I have it!—that leaves you scratching your head. Don’t despair. If you own a Samsung Galaxy PC and its Quick Search app, you might actually find it.
